Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to the New York state craft beverage industry
Summary: Requires the commissioner of economic development, in cooperation with the commissioner of agriculture and markets and the state liquor authority to establish procedures for proposing to the governor nominations for annual awards to be known as "New York state liquor retailers awards", "New York state beer retailers awards", "New York state cider retailer awards", and "New York state mead retailers awards"; requires the commissioner of economic development to promote state policies that will encourage the production and sale of New York labelled beers, ciders, liquors, and mead.
LawCode: Amd ยง100, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to promoting the New York state craft beverage industry
